title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list in the File menu does not contain any files between sessions.
EB: The MRU file list in the File menu should retain the files opened in the previous session and display them.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
